title: Can we have a little consistency when dealing with player behavior?
body:
This is literally one of the most concerning issues to me. 99% of all reports dealt with are all automated, so your fate relies on whether or not a bot thinks you are good for the game. A fucking bot.

Also, how is it that players that tell me to "fuck off and die" or, better yet, literally issue fucking death threats and provoke suicide are not punished. I don't understand. Meanwhile people have gotten permad for saying gg ez. I'm not saying that saying gg ez isn't a shitty thing to do, but how come they get banned while the people that PHYSICALLY THREATEN MY LIFE do not get banned.
